mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cdms_api_key WHERE key_id = #{ keyId,jdbcType=BIGINT }
mapper.update: UPDATE cdms_api_key SET app_name = #{ appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR }, api_key = #{ apiKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR }, status = #{ status,jdbcType=VARCHAR }, create_time = #{ createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP } WHERE key_id = #{ keyId,jdbcType=BIGINT }
